mms.controller

Class EditablePersonController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mms.controller.AbstractController
      • mms.controller.EditablePersonController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAbstractController, IEditablePersonController

    public class EditablePersonController
extends AbstractController
implements IEditablePersonController
    This class check the insert of the parameter of a new user.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli
